Package roomservice

Class OrderManager

java.lang.Object
roomservice.OrderManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileIO.ReadWrite
public class OrderManager extends Object implements FileIO.ReadWrite
Manages functionalities regarding the orders and menu items
Author:
Bach Nguyen

    • readMenu

      private ArrayList<MenuItems> readMenu(String filename) throws IOException
      Reads the .txt file that the menu is stored in
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to read from
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the menu
      Throws:
      IOException - Wrong filename or file does not exist

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IOException - Wrong filename or file does not exist
